name: 楊元森
objective: 使學生了解如何將計算機程式用到工程科學上,授課內容包括:計算機之誤差產生,非線性方程式,線性方程式,與基本有限元素法簡介.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to Numerical Analysis
Quiz: Basic numerical analysis concept
Week 2: Basic engineering analysis and unit conversion
Quiz: Unit conversion
Week 3: Taylor's theorem/series, floating-point error
Week 4: Pseudo-code, Taylor's series using MATLAB
Week 5: Nonlinear equation solution and bisection method
Week 6: Newton's method and secant method
Week 7: National holiday off
Week 8: Lagrange Interpolating Polynomials
Week 9: Multi-Dimensional Interpolation. Cubic Spline Interpolation
Week 10: Exercise
Week 11: Midterm
    (a) Newton's method
    (b) Secant Method
    (c) Lagrange Interpolating Polynomials
    (d) Cubic Spline Interpolation
Week 12: Midterm Review
Week 13: Numerical Differentiation
Week 14: Numerical Integration
Week 15: LU Matrix Decomposition
Week 16: Jacobi and CG Iterative Methods
Week 17: Nonlinear Systems of Equations: Newton's method
Week 18: Coordinate Transformation
scorePolicy:
30% 平時成績
20% 期中考
50% 期末報告
materials: 數值分析 第九版 (Burden, Faires) (江大成 譯) (Burden, Faires (2010) Numerical Analysis 9/E.)
